name: UICommand
desc: A menu element that performs its action in a selector.

items.name: init(title: String, image: UIImage?, action: Selector, propertyList: Any?, alternates: [UICommandAlternate], discoverabilityTitle: String?, attributes: UIMenuElement.Attributes, state: UIMenuElement.State)
var action: Selector
items.desc: The selector identifying the action method called after the user selects the command.

items.name: var discoverabilityTitle: String?
items.desc: An elaborated title that explains the purpose of the command.

items.name: var attributes: UIMenuElement.Attributes
items.desc: The attributes indicating the style of the command.

items.name: var alternates: [UICommandAlternate]
items.desc: An array of alternative actions to take for the command.

items.name: class UICommandAlternate
items.desc: An object representing an alternative action for a command.

items.name: var propertyList: Any?
items.desc: An object that contains data to associate with the command.

items.name: let UICommandTagShare: String
items.desc: A value that identifies a command as a Share menu.

items.name: init(title: String, subtitle: String?, image: UIImage?, action: Selector, propertyList: Any?, alternates: [UICommandAlternate], discoverabilityTitle: String?, attributes: UIMenuElement.Attributes, state: UIMenuElement.State)
